extends java.rmi.Remote

    • Method Detail

      • login

        boolean login​(java.lang.String name,
              ClientFunctionalities client)
       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Allow user to connect to server. Register remote client in Player remote and adds it to Lobby Controller
        Parameters:
        client - remote reference to client connecting
        name - client name
        Returns:
        true if login was successful
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • logout

        void logout()
     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Allow user to disconnect from server Removes remote client in Player remote
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Allow user that detects a network issue to reconnect to server
        Parameters:
        name - player name
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • createGame

        void createGame​(java.lang.String name,
                int maxPlayers,
                int maxDeaths,
                int turnDuration,
                int mapID)
         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Allow user to create a game while in the lobby
        Parameters:
        name - player name
        maxPlayers - in the game
        maxDeaths - in the game
        turnDuration - in seconds
        mapID - between 1 and 4
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

        Parameters:
        name - player name
        id - match id
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
